Component.tooltip: Enable this to bypass the script. Still responds to hanging notes.
Sample start offset time for legato and glide notes.
When enabled sustain pedal is used to retrigger notes, when disabled sustain pedal will hold legato notes.
Percentage of overall xfade time. If 0% note off mode is enabled
Set the intensity of the bend.
Rate for glide timer relative to current tempo.
When enabled glide rate knob will be controlled by note on velocity.
When enabled glides will be per whole step rather than each semi-tone.
Limits the maximum glide interval. A value of 0 means no limit
Breath controller knob, value should be set by CC.
When enabled release samples will only be triggered when no other keys are held.
